definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy

sentences.english: Summary: What does rise of the Tea Party movement mean for U.
sentences.chinese: 茶党运动的兴起对美国外交政策意味着什么呢？

sentences.english: China emphasizes a hands-off foreign policy towards the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.chinese: 中国强调不干涉他国内政的外交政策。

sentences.english: China will unswervingly carry out its independent foreign policy of peace in a comprehensive manner.
sentences.chinese: 中国将坚定不移地综合执行和平独立的外交政策。

sentences.english: With smart power, diplomacy will be the vanguard of our foreign policy.
sentences.chinese: 在灵活运用的力量中，外交将是我们外交政策的前卫。

sentences.english: Neutralism is the cornerstone of neutralism foreign policy.
sentences.chinese: 中立主义是缅甸外交政策的基石。

sentences.english: Ghaddafi spoke highly of China's independent foreign policy of peace, saying that China is a great nation in its development.
sentences.chinese: 卡扎菲高度评价中国奉行的和平外交政策。

sentences.english: He keynoted the nation's foreign policy in his speech.
sentences.chinese: 他在讲话中着重谈了该国的外交政策。

sentences.english: In foreign policy, they tend to be pro-Russian.
sentences.chinese: 在外交政策方面，他们往往是亲俄罗斯的。

sentences.english: Therevolutionary change Deng unleashed at home required a pragmatic pro-Westernforeign policy.
sentences.chinese: 邓在国内发起的变革需要采取务实的亲西方外交政策。

sentences.english: Obama's foreign policy is no less strange.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马的外交政策也令人大跌眼镜。

sentences.english: The US-Japan alliance, he said, would "continue to be the cornerstone of Japanese diplomatic policy".
sentences.chinese: 他说，“日美联盟将继续是日本外交政策的基石”。

sentences.english: On foreign policy, Obama has pushed for a more accommodating U.S. diplomacy.
sentences.chinese: 在外交政策上，奥巴马推行重合作的弹性政治路线。

sentences.english: Our foreign policy tilts toward the third world.
sentences.chinese: 我们的外交政策倾向于第三世界。

sentences.english: After the war the government reversed its foreign policy.
sentences.chinese: 政府在战后彻底改变了它的外交政策。

sentences.english: China had to reorient her foreign policy according to the new situation.
sentences.chinese: 中国必须根据新的形势重新调整其外交政策。

sentences.english: The analogies to our most recent foreign policy debates are obvious and telling.
sentences.chinese: 以此类推，我们最近的外交政策辩论也是如此。

definition: Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-

pinyin: mao4 yi4 bao3 hu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: Mike Pence (1959-), US Republican politician, US vice president from 2017
